item.title: Steven Spielberg's 4 WWII Movies, Ranked Worst To Best
item.description: It's no secret that World War II has been a significant part of Steven Spielberg's career, but not ever film he's made about the conflict is the same.

item.title: Mufasa: The Lion King's Cast Break Down Meaningful Backstory & Lin-Manuel Miranda's "Straight Bangers"
item.description: Some of Mufasa: The Lion King's main cast discuss crafting a meaningful backstory, Lin-Manuel Miranda's genius, and working with Barry Jenkins.

item.title: "We Made The Deal Right There": Bruce Willis Audition For Classic Comedy Remembered 35 Years Later
item.description: One of the funniest roles in Bruce Willis' career is recalled by the film's director, who reportedly hired him right on the spot of his audition.
